answers.answer: I whent theough the same thing. Though my sugars became so unatable the had to enduce me early with my last pregnancy. Just keep trying the best you can. Watch what fruits you eat, stay away from breads and pastas, eat lots of green veggies they are sugar freebies. They dont effect your sugars one way or another. And your sugar levels are ok between 4 and 8.  Good luck and if you need to talk more about it look me up

The bread thing is what's getting me I ate two pieces of toast they told me as long as it was wheat I would be fine and the diet plan said two pieces and a egg and so I did that should have made it go up right? But it didn't it dropped I don't understand how.
That's weird. My dietitian told me anything between 60 and 120 is fine. She considers anything below 60 too low.

question: I was diagnosed with the gestational diabetes I'm doing exactly what they told me to on my diet and it has dropped majorly and is now known as too low!! I have to check it as soon as I wake up this morning I checked it was perfect at 81 I ate breakfast which they gave me a diet plan so I went by it yesterday and this morning so far and it dropped to 71 after 70 is to low they said. Last night for supper I had the same thing on the diet plan and even ate more then they said and it dropped to 68 which is too low once again Idk what to do
title: gestational diabetes going wrong
